posts.post_content: Here is my next lot of Mayo's---Hugh Duffy (a) $550---Kid Nichols 10 $1100---Tommy Mccarthy 10  $500---Dan Brouthers Balt  SGC 20  $1500---Billy Hamilton  30  $1000---Amos Russie  40  $2400---John Clarkson  40  $1500---Wilbert Robinson  40  $1700---Hugh Duffy  50  $2400---If there is interest, send me a email or reply and I will send front and back scans---thanks, Don====dhontz1@maine.rr.com
